description:
Adorable adventures await in a cartoonishly cute experience full of charming little squirrels, quirky monsters, and limitless nuts to collect. Save furry-friends in single-player adventures, or run until the end of time in endless mode. Grab a friend for local co-op and save woodland pals together, Letâ€™s Go Nuts is a nutty experience!

Key Features:
- Local co-op for up to 4 players
- Multiple game modes, available to single or co-op players
- 40 levels in four vibrant, cartoon-style environments
- Worlds packed with objects to escape treacherous hazards
- Cute and stylish gear to customize and outfit fashionable furry friends
name: Let's Go Nuts
